name: Kodi-Alexa Skill
description: An Alexa still that let's you control (almost) anything on a Kodi box.

KODI_ADDRESS.description: IP address or fully-qualified domain name to talk to Kodi.

KODI_PORT.description: Open port on your router that forwards to Kodi.

KODI_SCHEME.description: The Kodi webserver only supports HTTP, however if you have a reverse proxy running and have SSL enabled, enter 'https' here. Otherwise, leave blank.

KODI_SUBPATH.description: If using a reverse proxy you might need to add an extra bit to the url before 'jsonrpc'.

READ_TIMEOUT.description: How long to wait for responses from Kodi.  Don't change unless you know what you're doing.

READ_TIMEOUT_ASYNC.description: Read timeout for 'fire-and-forget' commands.  Increase gradually only if Kodi is sometimes not executing commands.

SKILL_APPID.description: Add your skill's Application ID here to verify incomming requests are from your copy of the skill.

SKILL_TZ.description: Your local time zone for responses that include absolute times. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones. Leave empty or undefined (commented out) if you don't need or want absolute time responses.

LANGUAGE.description: If you are German speaker, put 'de' here. If not, leave blank.

SHUTDOWN_MEANS_QUIT.description: If you'd like 'Alexa, tell Kodi to shut down' to quit Kodi instead of shutting down the system, type 'quit'.

DEEP_SEARCH.description: If you'd like to enable searching the entire library with generic play commands.

MAX_PLAYLIST_ITEMS.description: Maximum number of items to add to playlists.  Empty means unlimited.

MAX_UNWATCHED_SHOWS.description: Maximum number of items to fetch when looking for new shows.

MAX_UNWATCHED_EPISODES.description: Maximum number of items to fetch when looking for new episodes.

MAX_UNWATCHED_MOVIES.description: Maximum number of items to fetch when looking for new movies.

SKILL_LOGLEVEL.description: Set to CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, INFO, or DEBUG.

CACHE_BUCKET.description: Amazon S3 bucket or directory name in which to cache responses, if you wish to do so.  Leave empty to disable.

S3_CACHE_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key ID for the Amazon S3 cache bucket.

S3_CACHE_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Access Key for the Amazon S3 cache bucket.

OWNCLOUD_CACHE_URL.description: Base URL for ownCloud server where the cache will be located.
